channel.title: Very Easy Question - How do i compile and run my server?
channel.description:
Alright, so i have a server, and after i edit the files and everything, i don't understand what to press. Their is like 3 compile buttons, and 3 run buttons, no matter which one i press, it doesn't work and the server just goes down. I have to end up using memleak. So my question, how do i compile and run a server after i edit it?
Thanks.
(317 if it makes a difference)

item.title: Very Easy Question - How do i compile and run my server?
item.dc:creator: @guthix1pker guthix1pker
item.description:
@guthix1pker wrote:

it doesn´t. first check your compile servers (right click - edit) to see if they are to your version of jdk (so if it says c:\programfiles\java\jdk1.6.0_25[morestuffhere] and you have jdk 1.7.0 change it to c:\programfiles\java\jdk1.7.0) that should make your compiler work. if nothing works well get someone to fix em cuz the first one that made em probs did it wrong.

Read full topic
item.source: Very Easy Question - How do i compile and run my server?
